Package jchess.gamelogic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGame  
    IGameListener
    This facilitates linked classes to call GamePersenter methods.
    IGameState
    This provides abstraction to the current state of the data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Board" (only) related data.
    Game
    This class is responsible to perform operations against any activity on Board.
    GameState
    This class is container to hold current state of the Board.
    Move  
    MoveCandidacy  
    PieceAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Piece" (only) related data.
    PlayerAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Player" (only) related data.
    PositionAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Position" (only) related data.
    RuleAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Rule" (only) related data.
